subject: Urgent Warranty Claim - BreezeLite Everyday Hairdryer
body:
Dear Warranty Support Team,

I am writing to file an urgent warranty claim for my BreezeLite Everyday Dryer (Model BLD-150), which is still within the 3-month warranty period.

During normal use, the hairdryer began producing visible sparks and loud popping sounds near the safety plug and power connection. Due to the seriousness of this issue and potential electrical hazard, I immediately stopped using the product.

The hairdryer has not been dropped, exposed to water, or modified in any way, and it has only been used according to the user manual.

Please find attached a copy of the purchase receipt and images clearly showing the damage and sparking near the safety plug. I kindly request instructions on the next steps for inspection, replacement, or refund under the warranty policy.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Sincerely,
EMily James
Phone: +1-555-123-4567
Email: emily.james@gmail.com
